item.title: Open Positions
item.description: Università degli Studi di Milano Biochemistry and Molecular Biology of Metabolism-Mass Spectrometry Lab Three positions (1 Postdoc, 1 Computational Postdoc and 1 Technician) are available in the “Giovanni Galli” laboratory of Biochemistry and Molecular Biology of Metabolism - Mass Spectrometry within the Department of Pharmacological and Biomolecular Sciences-DiSFeB Complete Announcement
